QuestData.Title: The Prophet Hadassi
QuestData.Description: Prophet Hadassi is the wisest and eldest member of the Orsis tribe.$B$BHe has not been accounted for and his well-being is of vital importance.$B$BGo into Orsis and find him. A great day of reckoning will come to the Al'Akir's lackeys if he's been hurt.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Prophet Hadassi in Orsis.
QuestData.RewardText: Who... who are you? Sent here... to rescue my people and fight our enemies.
